content: the **havskum headband** 1 is a chunkier version of the lovely universe headband and is crocheted with the universe xl version the yarn comes in many beautiful color combinations with a hint of glitter that really gets to shine in this project the design gives the headband a lovely chunky texture and a pleasant fit you could combine the havskum headband with the **wrist warmers** 2 from the same line have fun **materials ** - hobbii universe xl color 03 - crochet hook 4 **yarn usage ** approx 55 60 65g **gauge ** approx 19 sts x 15 row = 10 x 10 cm - measured on alternating fpdc and bpdc **sizes ** 50 54 58 cm **width ** approx 10 cm **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st s ** stitch es **double_crochet** double_crochet **fpdc** front post double_crochet **bpdc** back post double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/havskum-headband utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=havskum-headband+hbtrack&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/havskum-wrist-warmers utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=wrist-warmers+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
